2 Keep other hand on the womenâ€™s lower abdomen just above the pubic symphysis. When examining 
finger reach the end of vagina, turn your fingers upwards so that they come in contact with cervix.
3 Feel the cervix. It should be soft and elastic, and closely applied to the presenting part.
4 Measure the dilatation of cervical os by inserting your middle and index finger into the open cervix 
and gently opening the fingers to reach the cervical rim (distance in cm bet
